WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 06 OCT
   BY M/V OCEANIC CHAMPION TOWING 14
   3700 METER LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   21-06S 039-41W, 21-06S 039-41W,
   21-21S 040-13W, 21-20S 040-13W,
   21-18S 040-14W, 21-14S 040-14W,
   21-12S 040-14W, 21-08S 040-13W,
   21-05S 040-12W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2979/18.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 07 OCT 18.
